constraint.name: ca_terminalespos_almacen
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codalmacen) REFERENCES almacenes (codalmacen) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_terminalespos_cliente
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codcliente) REFERENCES clientes (codcliente) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_terminalespos_series
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codserie) REFERENCES series (codserie) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE
